    • Method Detail

      • addReview

        public void addReview(java.lang.String reviewerId,
                      java.lang.String auctionId,
                      java.lang.String stars,
                      java.lang.String review)
        This method adds a new review to the website. The review logic as of current version states that only the user that have successfully won the auction is allowed to review (and only once). This have to be checked before calling this method.

      • deleteReview

        public void deleteReview(java.lang.String id)
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the review that will be deleted

      • getReviewsDTOS

        private java.util.List<ReviewsDTO> getReviewsDTOS(java.util.List<ReviewsDTO> reviews,
                                                  java.util.List<java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.String>> reviewsMap)
        Helper method to convert between data from database and objects.

      • retrieveAllReviews

        public java.util.List<ReviewsDTO> retrieveAllReviews()
        Returns:
        ArrayList<ReviewsDTO> containing all the reviews for the ended auctions of the website

      • retrieveReviewsFilteredBySellerName

        public java.util.List<ReviewsDTO> retrieveReviewsFilteredBySellerName(java.lang.String sellerName)
        Parameters:
        sellerName - the name of the seller to filter by
        Returns:
        ArrayList<ReviewsDTO> containing all the reviews for the ended auctions of the website, filtered by seller's name
